abstract: Defense Department confirms death of one American service member in Afghanistan.

headline.main: U.S. Military Deaths in the Afghan War

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,365 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,365 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
